The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 January is 2,992,238 (5,316 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 January, there were 292,905 new confirmed cases (520.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 January, there were 356,328 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (63,423 fewer cases).
